minPasswordLengthWarning: Password must contain a minimum of 8 characters.
useGoogleAuth: Use Google Authenticator to get confirmation code.
twoAuthDescription: Scan the QR code with the Google Authenticator app on your smartphone and enter the 6-digit PIN the app generated in order to enable 2FA.
emailConfirmationTip: We just sent the code to your email address. Please, check your inbox or spam folder.
googleAuthConfirmationTip: Use Google Authenticator to get confirmation code.
